Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a game-tying home run in the sixth inning
Jose Iglesias smacked a go-ahead RBI single in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Edwin Diaz rebounded from two consecutive losses to nail down the save in a dominant ninth
Others: The Mets took both the three-game set and the season series from Arizona
The Mets escaped their recent tour of National League West contenders with a winning record
The Mets are now three games back of the Braves for the final NL playoff spot
